title: 0% ip boost?
body: on my client is says theres an IP boost thing going on but when i look to see what my bonus will be it says 0% im confused

replies.body: Is it a win boost? If so, you'll only see the boost if you win a match.

no, its not a win boost its a party reward ip boost, i think its just a glitch because i asked my party can they see it on their client and they said no, also i didnt get extra ip when winning games so ya.

I looked into this further and *Lew* is correct. You're seeing this boost listed because we enabled a flat IP boost for the first week of this new ranked season when playing in Ranked Flex Mode. You'll see 0% if you're playing any game mode outside of ranked flex, as shown below:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/665aa855bf134f73912a8eb1d7993e6f.png

Let me know if you have any questions.

I think the IP [boost ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2017-ranked-season-kicks)is active for just ranked flex queue and other queues won't give the boost and is why you may see the 0%

From [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2017-ranked-season-kicks):

>Oh, and by the way: due to limitations with the way IP boosts are implemented, it will appear that solo players are not included here, but this is purely a display issue - youâ€™ll still receive the +50% extra IP at the end of the game! 

So despite it showing 0% bonus, you should still be getting +50% IP when you play ranked flex.
